remarks: Hilbert space scalar multiplication by zero.  (Contributed by NM, 7-Sep-2007.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
hlmul0.1 $e |- X = ( BaseSet ` U ) $.
hlmul0.4 $e |- S = ( .sOLD ` U ) $.
hlmul0.5 $e |- Z = ( 0vec ` U ) $.
hlmul0 $p |- ( ( U e. CHilOLD /\ A e. X ) -> ( 0 S A ) = Z ) $.
